{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Malnaj |image = Portrait Malnaje Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Malnaj.png |image3 = Call for help.png |caption = |race = Orlan |subrace = Wild |gender = Female |culture = [Principi sen Patrena](/principiSenPatrena/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = Cipher |level = 10 |MIG = 11 |CON = 12 |DEX = 12 |PER = 15 |INT = 13 |RES = 14 |location = [World map](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/), onboard her ship ''[Misery's Delight](/miserysDelight/)'' (near [Sayuka](/sayuka/))
"Call for help", [Karatapu Channel](/karatapuChannel/) |quests = [A Sorcerer and a Gentleman](/aSorcererAndAGentleman/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = Equipped gear, [Fine Mail Armor](/fineMailArmorDeadfire/) (instead of [Príncipi Mail Armor](/principiMailArmor/)) |head = Príncipi Hat |body = Príncipi Mail Armor |weapon1 = Exceptional Blunderbuss (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Blunderbuss |weapon2 = Fine Flail (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Flail |weapon2_offhand = Fine Stiletto (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Stiletto |internalname = CHA_RE_Principi_Captain_Malnaj |guid = 05d26392-edf9-4665-b837-be1bcbd9f819 }} '''Malnaj''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background One of the most ruthless shiphunters in the Deadfire, Malnaj is a Principi captain of the ship ''[Misery's Delight](/miserysDelight/)'', and one-time mistress of [Serafen](/serafen/) (in the I-kick-your-ass-and-own-you-on-this-ship sense). Her mistreatment of Serafen while she was ''The Sorcerer''s mindhunter left scars that run deep. Although it's been years since the two met, the hatred is real. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [A Sorcerer and a Gentleman](/aSorcererAndAGentleman/) |none = |other = If you lied to her in [Sayuka](/sayuka/) and later recieved the [Unsigned Missive](/unsignedMissive/), she will be found next to Oathbinder's Sanctum at the "Call for help" camp, seeking revenge. }} ## =Quests = * [A Sorcerer and a Gentleman](/aSorcererAndAGentleman/): She is looking to claim the bounty on Remaro's head. Malnaj can be encountered randomly on the world map in Neketaka while tracking down Remaro, and then later in [Sayuka](/sayuka/) where she can be dealt with. [Category:Neketaka characters](/categoryNeketakaCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Malnaj |image = Portrait Malnaje Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Malnaj.png |image3 = Call for help.png |caption = |race = Orlan |subrace = Wild |gender = Female |culture = [[Principi sen Patrena]] |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = Cipher |level = 10 |MIG = 11 |CON = 12 |DEX = 12 |PER = 15 |INT = 13 |RES = 14 |location = [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|World map]], onboard her ship ''[[Misery's Delight]]'' (near [[Sayuka]])
"Call for help", [[Karatapu Channel]] |quests = [[A Sorcerer and a Gentleman]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = Equipped gear, [[Fine Mail Armor (Deadfire)|Fine Mail Armor]] (instead of [[Príncipi Mail Armor]]) |head = Príncipi Hat |body = Príncipi Mail Armor |weapon1 = Exceptional Blunderbuss (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Blunderbuss |weapon2 = Fine Flail (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Flail |weapon2_offhand = Fine Stiletto (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Stiletto |internalname = CHA_RE_Principi_Captain_Malnaj |guid = 05d26392-edf9-4665-b837-be1bcbd9f819 }} '''Malnaj''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== One of the most ruthless shiphunters in the Deadfire, Malnaj is a Principi captain of the ship ''[[Misery's Delight]]'', and one-time mistress of [[Serafen]] (in the I-kick-your-ass-and-own-you-on-this-ship sense). Her mistreatment of Serafen while she was ''The Sorcerer''s mindhunter left scars that run deep. Although it's been years since the two met, the hatred is real. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[A Sorcerer and a Gentleman]] |none = |other = If you lied to her in [[Sayuka]] and later recieved the [[Unsigned Missive]], she will be found next to Oathbinder's Sanctum at the "Call for help" camp, seeking revenge. }} ===Quests=== * [[A Sorcerer and a Gentleman]]: She is looking to claim the bounty on Remaro's head. Malnaj can be encountered randomly on the world map in Neketaka while tracking down Remaro, and then later in [[Sayuka]] where she can be dealt with. [[Category:Neketaka characters]]
title: Malnaj
